description: RESTful API endpoint for user management - ATDD/TDD example
feature: RESTful API endpoint for user CRUD operations
acceptanceCriteria: Given a valid POST request to /api/users with user data, when processed, then user is created and 201 response returned with user object
Given a POST request with invalid user data, when processed, then 400 response returned with validation errors
Given a GET request to /api/users/:id with valid ID, when processed, then 200 response returned with user object
Given a GET request to /api/users/:id with non-existent ID, when processed, then 404 response returned
Given a PUT request to /api/users/:id with valid updates, when processed, then user is updated and 200 response returned
Given a DELETE request to /api/users/:id, when processed, then user is deleted and 204 response returned
Given an unauthenticated request to protected endpoints, when processed, then 401 response returned
Given a request without proper permissions, when processed, then 403 response returned
notes: ATDD validates API contracts and status codes
TDD builds up request handling, validation, and business logic
Integration tests verify database operations and middleware
